headline: Reassessing Coinbase (COIN) Valuation After a Month-Long Share Price Slide
summary: Coinbase Global (COIN) has been drifting lower over the past month, and that slide is starting to test investors’ conviction. With crypto sentiment wobbling, the stock is quietly repricing expectations. See our latest analysis for Coinbase Global. That recent slide sits on top of a choppy year, with a weak 90 day share price return of 28.7 percent and a still eye catching three year total shareholder return above 600 percent, suggesting momentum has cooled but the long term story remains...

headline: US crypto industry cheers 2025 wins, but party may fizzle next year
summary: After celebrating Donald Trump's second presidential term by swilling cocktails and partying to Snoop Dogg at a pre-inauguration event in January, the crypto industry went on to notch major legislative and regulatory victories this year.  Among the industry's biggest wins under Trump's crypto-friendly ​second administration were the Securities and Exchange Commission's swift move to rescind stringent crypto accounting guidance and dismiss Biden-era lawsuits against Coinbase, Binance and others, as well as the ‌passage of a landmark law creating federal rules for dollar-pegged crypto tokens.  Along with Trump's creation of a bitcoin stockpile and the ‌SEC's approval of a raft of new crypto products, the changes together helped propel bitcoin to new peaks this year and pave the way for wider crypto adoption, sparking warnings from critics over potential investor and systemic risks.

raw.headline: US crypto industry cheers 2025 wins, but party may fizzle next year
raw.summary: After celebrating Donald Trump's second presidential term by swilling cocktails and partying to Snoop Dogg at a pre-inauguration event in January, the crypto industry went on to notch major legislative and regulatory victories this year.  Among the industry's biggest wins under Trump's crypto-friendly ​second administration were the Securities and Exchange Commission's swift move to rescind stringent crypto accounting guidance and dismiss Biden-era lawsuits against Coinbase, Binance and others, as well as the ‌passage of a landmark law creating federal rules for dollar-pegged crypto tokens.  Along with Trump's creation of a bitcoin stockpile and the ‌SEC's approval of a raft of new crypto products, the changes together helped propel bitcoin to new peaks this year and pave the way for wider crypto adoption, sparking warnings from critics over potential investor and systemic risks.

headline: Bitcoin and XRP Struggle Again. Why Coinbase, Robinhood, and Strategy Stocks Are Rising.
summary: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies remained stuck in a rut Thursday but crypto-exposed stocks were set for gains.  Bitcoin  was trading at $87,348, rising 0.7% over the past 24 hours, according to CoinDesk.  Other digital assets were struggling Thursday–  Ethereum  the second largest crypto, was down 2.6% to $2,848, while popular altcoin  XRP  fell 2.3% to $1.86.
